<cs> my lords i wish briefly on behalf of the select committee to echo the felicitous words that the lord president has spoken <e> <s> we should like to thank the members of the european parliament for the help they have given us on many occasions and if i may say so for the great service they have rendered to this house and the country <e> <s> they rendered it under very difficult circumstances and in some cases at least they rendered it at some peril to their own health <e>
